content: whidbey island has beautiful pebbly beaches if you look carefully you may even find an agate these pebbles inspired this quick and easy beanie great for beach hikes or a trip to the mountains for ski season this is a free pattern please credit whidbey isle yarns #whidbeyisleyarns on instagram and whidbey isle yarns on fb for any photos posting the completed pattern please do not reproduce the pattern without written permission from info@whidbeyyarns net happy knitting
